testCases.label: Verify counter increment functionality
testCases.description: Clicks the increment button and asserts that the display element updates to the expected incremented values sequentially.

testCases.label: Verify even/odd text after 1 click
testCases.description: Clicks the counter button once and verifies that the evenOrOddText element shows 'even', assuming the counter starts at 1.

testCases.label: Verify even/odd text after 2 clicks
testCases.description: Clicks the counter button twice and verifies that the evenOrOddText element shows 'odd', assuming the counter starts at 1.
